metadata.synopsis: Laezel is warning the player to not mess around with the gith in this Creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers if the players start a fight against gith in the Creche unprovoked.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Don't be foolish. Provoke these githyanki, and they will crush your skulls into powder.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Provoke me, and I won't hesitate to join them.
